name: Yoga Flows
description: A series of controlled movements designed to improve flexibility, stability, and mindfulness.

cards.title: Sun Salutation Flow
cards.description: A foundational yoga sequence that enhances flexibility and promotes relaxation.
bulletpoints: Perform a sequence of forward bends, lunges, and upward stretches
Complete 5-10 rounds to energize the body
cards.summaryText: Link breath to each pose in repeated sun salutations to warm the body and steady the mind.

cards.title: Warrior Sequence for Strength and Stability
cards.description: A dynamic yoga flow that strengthens the lower body and improves balance.
bulletpoints: Move through Warrior I, II, and III positions
Engage the core for better posture and control
Hold each position for a few breaths to deepen flexibility
cards.summaryText: Transition through the warrior poses while rooting the legs and engaging core to build powerful balance.
